resources.string:
I am Chaity Paul. I am a student at the University of Rajshahi. 

 I am a student of Computer Science and Engineering Department. 

 I love to learn new things. 

 I am a fan of Android. I like to hear music. 
 I like to read books. I like to play games. I like to watch movies. 

 I am from Rajshahi, Bangladesh. 
 I love my country. 

 My favorite food is pizza. 
 My favorite drink is coffee. 
 My favorite color is purple. 

 I love coding but still now I can not do well in it. 

 I am new at Android. 

 Patience is needed to learn Android.
